alert.note: Alert for Elk (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 8:30PM CDT until May 31 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR ELK COUNTY... At 829 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grenola, or 9 miles southwest of Howard, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Howard, Moline, Longton, Grenola and Elk Falls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
